TopicTitle: Can you change size of the icons, etc. in the settings

Articles.Content:
As the title says...

Can you change size of the icons, etc. in the settings anywhere?

You can change the size of (most of) the flight UI. In other words, the Navball and stuff.

Other than that - nope. The current UI does not support it. You could try keeping your fingers crossed for the full UI rework they are currently doing for the next patch, but I don't think I've seen any Squad person actually talk about the topic of UI scaling. That doesn't mean it won't be supported; it simply means I cannot promise you it will be.

Where do you change this?  I was turning down the music one day and I opened up the setting you can get to from the Space Center from the menu that come up when you have esc.  Something changed in the display (not sure what, but I think the icons on the top changed size?)  Though I didn't see any setting that sounded like they would do that.

Most settings are only available from the main menu, not from the space center screen. This is one of them.

There's a slider somewhere on the first tab that should literally read "flight UI size".
